question: Which two countries fought the "Paquisha War"?
explanation: Ecuador and Peru fought the Paquisha War between 22 January and 5 February 1981 in Condor mountain range in the Ecuador-Peru border on the dispute over the control of three watch posts which ultimately lead to Peruvian victory and the posts installed by the Ecuadorians came to be controlled by the Peruvian authority. This war is also known as Fake Paquisha War of Upper Comaina Conflict.
